8am: 25 km 1500 D + the first part of the course will take you to the top of the Ayr√© funicular and the plateau lumi√®re before joining the montagne fleurie trail. NEW for 2023: leave the 13 km route and reach the summit of Montagne Fleurie via the Capet ridge, which offers a bird's-eye view of the valley. Beware: this is a technical race with a fairly "thick" gradient (as we say here)! The passage over the crests is 325 D+ for 1 km! Enjoy!
8:30 am: 13 km 725 D+, a very pleasant run where some will be able to test their time, while others will be trying their hand at their first trail. The current record? 1h09 minutes? who's up for the challenge?
